title: Yupiteru ni Onegai
description:
"We are not aware of our feelings..."

I am Yukiki, university freshmen. I have a childhood friend's brother. It's just a bit random Iori with a twist and a Japanese man like a dandelion. The night when two people visited my apartment, I face a shocking situation. Iori and Kazuto were kissing in front of the bed. Excitement, jealousy, erection .... I could not hold it, but the next day, I was shocked to be confused. Then they rubbed their bodies, saying that they felt strange when they thought of me...
